noun.definition: A geological era characterized by the presence of certain types of animals
noun.example: The Paleozoic is a zoic era.

verb.definition: To relate or classify according to animal life (coined usage)
verb.example: The biologist zoiced the fossil layers to classify the animals.

usage_examples: Scientists study fossils to understand zoic periods of Earth.
The biologist zoiced the fossil layers to classify the animals.
